\subsection{Detailed Description}
Class represents a reference counted Python\+Object. 

Python\+Object is appropriately Py\+\_\+\+I\+N\+C\+R\+EF\textquotesingle{}d and Py\+\_\+\+D\+E\+C\+R\+EF\textquotesingle{}d
